website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Print Run 2.0 has managed to establish a massive fan base owing to its high comfortability, enhanced grip and sturdy yet flexible construction. The shoe has a very stylish look which satisfies the fashion urge of the looks-conscious people, as well.
pros: The Reebok Print Run 2.0 is, according to the majority, the pair of comfortable running shoes
Many customers praised the snug fit of the upper since it prevented any interior wobbling of the foot
Most runners highlighted the light weight of the shoe, which helped in running extra miles
A few wearers believed that the quality of the footwear was excellent since it held up well, even after many miles of running
Some individuals mentioned that the shoe caused no uncomfortable rubbing or chafing against the skin, resulting in zero blisters
A few customers appreciated the look of the shoe by calling it ‘stylish’
A user said that the shoe’s sole was firm yet highly flexible
it allowed him to follow his natural style while running
A purchaser commented that the Reebok Print Run 2.0 was priced very reasonably
A user with plantar fasciitis said that the shoe provided great arch support
A few wearers mentioned that the footwear felt really soft and smooth against the skin
An individual was of the opinion that the shoe was made using fine-quality materials
A purchaser lauded the breathability of the shoe’s upper
cons: A few wearers had experienced blistering from running in these shoes
A user thought that the shoe was not comfortable to wear
A runner mentioned that the shoe felt like a combat cleat
for him, its weight was heavy
Some purchasers had problems with the sizing schemes of the Reebok Print Run 2.0

customer_reviews.title: Rubber formulation changed.
customer_reviews.text: there is a major change in the rubber used in the sole between the "z print" and this "print 2.0" version. the rubber is hard and the 3d bumps on the sole are now flat. terrible i quit using the after the first day but would not pay five dollars to ship them back. I'll just give them away to somebody with less sensitive feet, or maybe someone i dont like. stop making hard bottom shoes reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Dean James

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these shoes a couple of time I developed a blister on the inside of my left foot near the heel. I checked out the inside of the shoe and notice he insole is not set in properly when made. So I am a little disappointed and won't be able to wear them again unless I can solve this problem like shaving off part of the insole. Never had this problem with any other Reeboks
customer_reviews.author: DEP

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable shoe I've ever purchased. The sewing at ...
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable shoe I've ever purchased. The sewing at the back heel area of the right shoe may have been the work of Ray Charles.
customer_reviews.author: Baldore

customer_reviews.title: Narrow narrow narrow
customer_reviews.text: I fit into regular width shoes from other manufacturers fine. The length is true to fit but, WOW, these are NARROW. I have given a few wears and no relief. Can't wear. Can't return.
customer_reviews.author: a ham

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, airy, comfortable, but at a price.
customer_reviews.text: I still wear these shoes, but mostly for hiking and goofing off now. Toe is starting to fray pretty badly on one and the soles are a very lightweight, foamy material that's super comfy to walk on but also shaved itself flat pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Untransparent mesh, sturdy carcass
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is 2-layered, very strong. I wonder if the air circulation will be good. Will see. Sole is strong, but flexible and comfortable. Quality of this shoes is very good, packed well and delivered as declared. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Oleksandr S.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone looking for a fairly priced athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Use these for the gym and general wear around. Great fit and support, which says a lot because I usually have a hard time finding shoes that fit well. Would recommend to anyone looking for a fairly priced athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SDJL

customer_reviews.title: Got a good hard 6months out of these on moving
customer_reviews.text: These soft rubber soles stick to an aluminum ramps for moving .great, worn every day , long days got solid 6months out of them. Very comfortable, bought another similar pair
customer_reviews.author: mrmkelly

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: For perfectly for my size and they’re extremely comfortable. Almost no weight to them at all so a great running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Kujala

customer_reviews.title: my feet love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, had 4 pairs down to 1 pair, getting low will buy if you dont
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable....superb fit - I have always had great fits with Reebok shoes. The center of the soles is s softer material and tends to wear out more quickly than hard rubber, but as a modest trade off in durability for the comfort and fit, I can live with it happily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Little Big but still good
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and stylish. I basically only wear Reebok. So compared to my NaNo collection, these are about a 1/4 too big. Excellent for running!!!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These did not prove to be as comfortable or supportive as other Reebok shoes i have worn... Especially with regards to lateral movement and torsion. They may serve well as a basic "running only" shoe, but they aren't great for impact or intense movements.
customer_reviews.author: CG Mania

customer_reviews.title: Great for weightlifting and general anaerobic exercise
customer_reviews.text: Not for running. Great for weightlifting and general anaerobic exercise, though.
customer_reviews.author: tekight

customer_reviews.title: Short on the support
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a bit more arch support and cushion but it felt stiff . It reminded me of wearing the nanos but , just flat . I personally did not like it . It could work for others though .
customer_reviews.author: Nj

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use them almost every day I go to the gym, I give them 1 or 2 days off a week, love them
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 3 times, they’re great!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect! I do a lot of cardio and they support my feet in all the right places. This is the third pair I’ve ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cool Kicks
customer_reviews.text: I showroomed these shoes at DSW, and bought them on Amazon for $30 less. Good fit, cool looking pair of kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meredith

customer_reviews.title: But when I broke them in I have to say they rank up there with one of the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how I felt about these shoes at first. I have high arches and I didn't feel any support at first. But when I broke them in I have to say they rank up there with one of the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever had. I really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: VERY CHEAP MATERIAL AND NO GOOD , PRICE RIDICOLOUS DO NO RECOMENF
customer_reviews.author: roberto andino

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, light weight, they've instantly made my runs a bit more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He is ROUGH with shoes, and goes through as many as 3 pairs of running shoes a year between doing PT with the Army and going to the gym. These shoes have proven to withstand the torture he puts shoes through much better than many more expensive pairs. We will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size 13 seems to be very nice but I've only worn them a few times. Will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Charkas

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They came on time and fit as expected. They have comfortable fit which allows you to use them for any activity.
customer_reviews.author: victor morales

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight shoe with great support. The flexable sole allows for a more natural run feel that I don't get in stiffer shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JWA

customer_reviews.title: Reedbok
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for ever day walking around town, lots of arch support, great for short distance runs too all around amazing
customer_reviews.author: Edward Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice running shoe. I look forward to wearing them when I walk and run.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Pace

customer_reviews.title: Yes, May I Have Another?
customer_reviews.text: Dude....These shoes... Light, breathable...what else can I say? I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: ... tennis / running shoes for 30 years and been happy most of the time
customer_reviews.text: i have owned Reebok tennis / running shoes for 30 years and been happy most of the time , i go threw them to fast though i work in them i have tried others but i like Reebok better then them all ,,levies and Reebok and I'm a happy man
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: not for running
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfy, size to size (9,5 US = 27.5 cm), but visually looks huge (as 10,5), like dutch shoes)) Nice walking pair, not good for running because of physiologically incorrect sole with big flat heel.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, very disappointed that they took 11 days for delivery. I hate giving real bad reviews. Again the shoes are great as expected, work on delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: David Peacher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice, but very narrow and dig into sides of my feet
customer_reviews.author: Kala B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Nice comfortable fit. Very light shoe. Happy and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pete!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Look better than photo. Super comfy!! Order 1/2 size down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit nicely. The color is as expected and are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Let my expectations. They fit nicely. The color is as expected and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good at the gym. A good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Very well constructed. I returned this item because it was too big. I have owned about 6 pairs of Reebok athletic shoes over the past 4 years and tho sis the only pair that has been big to my standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: The best running shoes i've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Just WOW! The best running shoes i've ever had! (I have Puma, Mizuno, Anta, Fila, and also Reebok (2 pairs)). Reebok - the best! Excellent! Awesome, very comfortable sole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. Right shoe tongue was cut weird ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Right shoe tongue was cut weird and digs into the top of my foot. Unfortunately wouldn't know this without wearing for a couple days and so cant return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Met my my expectations and more. I use this shoe to go running every morning without missing a day and it has held up. It also feels very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these sneakers. The are light and breathe really well.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Quality is superb fit is a bit small. Awesome shoes all together.
customer_reviews.author: blusterfind

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Laces are not the most robust. They untie often
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, fits good, soft but not spongy, flexible sole that allows you to feel the ground (but not too much)
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm an 11 and they fit just fine. Comfortable shoe to run in
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. I'm an 11 and they fit just fine. Comfortable shoe to run in.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not a good show for running
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker is a good fit just not as much cushion as I would like for a running sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Apolinaris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear very light on your feet. I really like to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: dramsey911

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for Reebok
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are poor quality. They feel like I'm wearing two different pairs of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Allison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes but I bought size 9 , It could be better to buy Size 9,5 .
customer_reviews.author: YIGIT C.

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheap shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Fits well, the sole is very comfortable. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: cmm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My first shoe buyed from Amazon and I really glad!
customer_reviews.author: David Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: colour was not clear. Thought it was white instead it is a pale gray,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the shoes fit nicely and seemed to be of a high quality considering ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a whole size too large. This keeps happening with shoe companies. Should I just buy 6.5 shoes always now? I am confused if the national shoe conversion chart has simply shifted for no reason. Although too large, the shoes fit nicely and seemed to be of a high quality considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Octavian Fish

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth it
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I never expected this terrible quality from Reebok. Outer smaller linings you see in image are of cloth which is terrible. You cannot really use these shoes is wet places as water easily passes through. As my intention of buying this shoe is to roam outdoors, I do not expect to be very cautious to protect my shoe from water than myself.
customer_reviews.author: jagadeeshkumar

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars just because I didn't know the tongue of the shoe was stitched to the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Print Run 2.0-M Print Run 2.0
product_meta.description: Each part of your foot functions differently. Reebok engineered these running shoes based on 3D scans of moving feet for targeted cushion and flexibility. Independent nodes on the bottom flex at the forefoot, and a perimeter outsole grid keeps you stable. The breathable upper helps cool your feet.
